title: The Infernal Element
opening: In the hidden village Arcadia stands an ancient temple.  One of the Divine
Weapons is said to be hidden in it.
Roy and company were quick to follow Bern's troops, who had already found their

intro.speaker: Ohtz
intro.line: Haven’t you found the Divine Weapon yet!?

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: We think it is inside this altar, but it won’t open...

intro.speaker: Ohtz
intro.line: Break it open, then! We don’t have much time.

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: But we must also deal with the enemies that have entered the temple! We don’t have enough manpower to use force on the altar.

intro.speaker: Ohtz
intro.line: Very well, defeat the enemy first! Then we shall examine the altar with leisure.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: This is the underground of the desert? There’s so much...water.

intro.speaker: Sophia
intro.line: This is close...to a large source of groundwater... That is why...plants and animals can live near here...

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: I see, so that’s why you were able to build a village here. Still, how did you find such a convenient place like this?

intro.speaker: Sophia
intro.line: Athos... Archsage Athos is the one...who led us here...

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: What? Do you mean Athos of the Eight Heroes?

intro.speaker: Sophia
intro.line: Yes... After the Scouring...Athos traveled around Elibe... At the end of his journey, he arrived at our village...in which men and Dragons were living in harmony... But he said that...it would only be a matter of time before we were found...

intro.speaker: Sophia
intro.line: Yes... And he hid his Divine Weapon...inside this temple...

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Can we use his Divine Weapon?

intro.speaker: Sophia
intro.line: Yes... Athos told us...to use his weapon to protect Arcadia... And your fight against Bern...will lead to our safety...

intro.speaker: Sophia
intro.line: Some of the temple’s passages...may suddenly sink into the water... Please be careful...

boss.speaker: Ohtz
boss.line: I…wasn’t expecting you to fight so well against all of us.

boss.speaker: Ohtz
boss.line: Where…did you learn to fight…like this…

end.speaker: Sophia
end.line: The Divine Weapon is here...inside this altar...

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: ... It won’t open.

end.speaker: Sophia
end.line: This altar is made...so that only those of the village may open it... Please allow me...

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Okay.

end.speaker: Sophia
end.line: ...... Here... This is the Divine Weapon...

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Athos’ Divine Weapon? Then...

end.speaker: Sophia
end.line: Yes... The Infernal Element...Foreblaze...

end.speaker: Elder Of Arcadia
end.line: Who are you? How did you enter here?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: My name is Roy. I came with Sophia to protect this village.

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: With Sophia...? Then it was you who drove off Bern’s soldiers? Oh... Please forgive my impudence. I am the Elder of Arcadia.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Elder... Then are you the Dragon?

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: Dragon... They once called me that. But that is a story of a time long since past.

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: Let me see... The only real Dragon we have is Fa right here.

end.speaker: Fa
end.line: Hi...

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: This little girl is a Dragon?

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: Yes, although she is far from her mature form.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Elder, do you know anything about the Dragons in Bern?

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: What! There are Dragons in Bern?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Yes, we have seen them.

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: Why...? Dragons do not exist anywhere except here.

end.speaker: Igrene
end.line: Elder, if I may.

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: What is it, Igrene?

end.speaker: Igrene
end.line: Sophia said that she could detect evil energy coming from Bern’s troops. That may have something to do with the Dragons Master Roy says he saw in Bern’s army.

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: Perhaps... But I am too old to detect such energy now.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Energy? What is that?

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: Sophia is half Dragon, half human. That gives her the ability to detect the pulses emitted from other Dragons. But because she can’t detect them clearly, she only said that she felt a force...twisted and unnatural.

end.speaker: Igrene
end.line: I think that we should look into it. Elder, if you would allow it, I would like to join Master Roy and look at Bern’s Dragons myself.

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: I really do not want to deal with matters of the outside... But this is a time of emergency. Well then, Roy, will you take her?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Certainly.

end.speaker: Igrene
end.line: I am Igrene, the Guardian of Nabata. I have confidence in my skills with the bow. I believe I may be of some help in battle.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Thank you.

end.speaker: Fa
end.line: Fa’s going, too!

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: What are you saying? Of course you may not. There is no telling what could happen if your existence were exposed to the world!

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Well then, let’s go.

end.speaker: Igrene
end.line: Yes.

end.speaker: Fa
end.line: ...Fine... Fa will just follow them anyway!
